description:
Custom Rich Presence (playing status) manager for Discord. Features run on startup and minimizing to tray.


Changes:
- Installer will properly close the app before installing after this update.
- Uninstaller will now remove the startup shortcut(s).
- Updated French (new translator, Yo-3DS), Chinese.
Thanks to 5wi for their donation! If you want to donate as well, check out CustomRP's website!
.exe will install the program to %appdata%\CustomRP; .zip is a portable version of the program.
AppVeyor Build 173
